I read the whole description and no where does it say the main show is included. He lists three seperate sections. Overtime, Downtime and Backstage pass. Many people don't read the full description. In hindsite I'm sure he would have put at the top in bold letters JUST OVERTIME and DOWNTIME. But the pirate bay doesn't allow you to edit your decription. Don't be too hard on the guy, he is just uploading what he has. For those of us outside the U.S, the little extras that people upload are a nice addtition
MP4SUX does not do the show(as far as I know) but his efforts with Overtime are well appreciated. It's the best RTWBM Overtime out there.
WTF, it's not not like I am not unappreciative. But can some uploaders PLEASE, upload a bigger file so we can see this properly on big tvs? I mean, our retinal displays and ect...Thank you
MP4SUX ROX.  This is an excellent torrent, but like everyone else I'm gnashing my teeth trying to find the actual episode.  Thanks for your work though mate.

p.s. - My shiny new pink skull was NOT asked for (but very much appreciated), however if any of you think it should be withdrawn - just go into the forums and tell them I didn't bend to your every demand and show me who's really in charge around here. For the record, management said it was because of what I'd already posted ...

... and for being polite ...

It's really easy to be polite. The first six things you write - throw them away and then think carefully about what you really want enshrined here as a testament to your temperament. In case you haven't noticed, it's nearly impossible to take anything back once you've clicked on "submit".
